battleTraits.name: Lightning Reactions
battleTraits.effect: When players are alternating picking units to use a **FIGHT** ability, when it is your turn to pick a unit, you can pick 2 units instead of 1. Resolve the second **FIGHT** ability immediately after the first.

battleTraits.name: Shining Company
battleTraits.effect:
You can only use this ability if you have not used any **FACET OF WAR** abilities this battle round.

Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly **VANARI** units for the rest of the battle round.

battleTraits.name: Move Like the Wind
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any **FACET OF WAR** abilities this battle round. Pick up to 3 friendly **HURAKAN** units that are not in combat to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect: Each target can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It cannot move into combat during any part of that move, and it cannot use **SHOOT** abilities for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Power of Hysh
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any **FACET OF WAR** abilities this battle round. Pick a friendly **VANARI** unit to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: The target's attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+ for the rest of the battle round.

battleTraits.name: Deep Thinkers
battleTraits.effect:
You can only use this ability if you have not used any **FACET OF WAR** abilities this battle round.

Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **SCINARI** units for the rest of the battle round.

battleTraits.name: Enduring as Rock
battleTraits.effect:
You can only use this ability if you have not used any **FACET OF WAR** abilities this battle round.

 Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of weapons used for attacks that target friendly **ALARITH** units for the rest of the battle round.

abilities.name: Alarith Fortitude
abilities.effect: You can use the 'Enduring as Rock' ability in addition to the other **FACET OF WAR** ability used during the battle round.

spells.name: Summon Sanctum of Amyntok
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Sanctum of Amyntok** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **LUMINETH REALM-LORDS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **LUMINETH REALM-LORDS INFANTRY HERO** wholly within 12" of them and more than 3" from all other units and terrain features to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Sanctum of Amyntok** within the target's combat range, visible to the caster and not in combat. A **Sanctum of Amyntok** has 3 parts that must be set up touching each other so that they form a ring with the target inside.

abilities.name: Independent Operative
abilities.effect:
If this unit has not been deployed, set it up anywhere on the battlefield not in combat with any enemy units. This unit has now been deployed.

Designerâ€™s Note: Enemy units that deploy after this unit can deploy in combat with it.

abilities.name: Lone Agent
abilities.effect: Add 5 to this unitâ€™s control score while it is more than 9" from all other friendly units.

abilities.name: Supreme Swordmaster
abilities.effect: Ignore negative modifiers to hit rolls and wound rolls for this unitâ€™s attacks. In addition, ignore negative modifiers to the characteristics of this unitâ€™s melee weapons.

abilities.name: Spirit Armour
abilities.effect: Ignore all modifiers to save rolls for this unit (positive and negative).

abilities.name: Reservoir of Power
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly Lumineth Realmâ€‘lords units while they are wholly within 6" of this Manifestation.

abilities.name: Transporting Vortex
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly Lumineth Realmâ€‘lords unit wholly within 12" of this unit and not in combat to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Windleap
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Hurakan Windchargers unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 3" to the targetâ€™s Move characteristic for the rest of the turn and the target has Fly for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Deathly Furrows
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy Infantry unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Firestealer Hammers is 4.

abilities.name: Unbreakable Bulwark

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: If this unit did not charge this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of the targetâ€™s melee weapons for the rest of the turn and add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unitâ€™s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Unshakeable Faith of the Mountains
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 different friendly Alarith Aelf units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targetsâ€™ melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Stonemage Symbiosis
abilities.effect: The â€˜Battle Damagedâ€™ ability has no effect on this unit while it is wholly within 12" of a friendly Alarith Stonemage.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Stoneheart Worldhammer is 3.

abilities.name: Stoneheart Shockwave

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: If this unit did not charge this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Stonemage Symbiosis
abilities.effect: The â€˜Battle Damagedâ€™ ability has no effect on this unit while it is wholly within 12" of a friendly Alarith Stonemage.

abilities.name: Swordsmasters
abilities.effect:
Each time this unit uses a Fight ability, you must pick either the Perfect Strike or Flurry of Blows weapon characteristics for all the attacks it makes with its Sunmetal Blades.

In addition, do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with Perfect Strike. Instead, roll a dice. On a 2+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Guardians
abilities.effect: While any friendly Scinari Heroes are wholly within this unitâ€™s combat range, both this unit and those friendly units have Ward (5+).

abilities.name: Purest Aetherquartz

header.text: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase

abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to casting rolls for this unit and subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Charge of the Lumineth

header.text: Once Per Battle, Your Charge Phase

abilities.declare: Pick this unit and up to 2 friendly Vanari Dawnriders units within this unitâ€™s combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect: You can re-roll charge rolls for the targets for the rest of the turn. In addition, if a target charges this phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that targetâ€™s weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Sigil of Yngra
abilities.effect:
While the unit that was picked to be the target of the â€˜Summon Sanctum of Amyntokâ€™ ability is inside the ring formed by this Manifestation:

â€¢ That unit has Ward (4+).
â€¢ If that unit is a Wizard, add 1 to that unitâ€™s power level.
â€¢ Instead of measuring range or visibility to that unit, measure to this Manifestation instead.
â€¢ This Manifestation cannot be picked to be the target of abilities other than Banish abilities.
â€¢ If that unit uses a Move ability, makes a pile-in move or is removed from the battlefield, this Manifestation is removed from play.

abilities.name: Solar Flare
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit or Manifestation wholly within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: If the target is a Manifestation, inflict 3D6 mortal damage on it. Otherwise, roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Voice of Tyrion

header.text: Reaction: You declared the â€˜All-out Attackâ€™ command for a friendly Vanari unit

abilities.effect: If this unit is wholly within 12" of the unit using the â€˜All-out Attackâ€™ command, no command points are spent to use that command.

warscrolls.name: Archmage Teclis and Celennar, Spirit of Hysh

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of Celennarâ€™s Moonbright Talons is 3.

abilities.name: Aura of Celennar
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for other friendly Lumineth Realmâ€‘lords Wizards while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Archmage
abilities.effect: Instead of making a casting roll for this unit, you can use a value of 10 for the roll that cannot be modified. In addition, instead of making an unbinding roll or banishment roll for this unit, you can use a value of 8 for the roll that cannot be modified.

abilities.name: Storm of Searing White Light
abilities.declare: Pick any number of different visible enemy units within 18" of this unit to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6 (see the â€˜Archmageâ€™ ability).
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Spirit of the Moon

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Darkness of the Soul
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract D6 from the targetâ€™s control score for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Absorb Despair
abilities.effect: Ignore negative modifiers to the control scores of friendly Lumineth Realm-lords units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Turn to Stone
abilities.declare: Pick each enemy unit within 6" of this Manifestation to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If a target has 3 mortal damage inflicted on it by this ability, it has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Sevireth, Lord of the Seventh Wind

abilities.name: Spirit of the Wind
abilities.effect: While friendly Hurakan units are wholly within 12" of this unit, they can use Shoot and/or Charge abilities even if they used a Run or Retreat ability in the same turn and no mortal damage is inflicted on them by Retreat abilities.

abilities.name: Searing Desert Winds

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 different enemy units in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll and subtract 1 from wound rolls for the targetâ€™s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: The Living Gale
abilities.effect: This unit cannot be targeted by shooting attacks made by enemy units that are more than 9" from this unit.

abilities.name: Rune of Enthlai

header.text: Once Per Turn, Reaction: You declared the â€˜Speed of Hyshâ€™, â€˜Overwhelming Heatâ€™ or â€˜Ethereal Blessingsâ€™ spell for this unit

abilities.effect: If that spell is successfully cast, roll a dice. On a 3+, after resolving the effect of that spell, this unit can immediately cast that spell a second time using the same casting roll. Do not count the second spell towards the number of Spell abilities this unit can use this turn.

abilities.name: Etheral Blessings
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly Lumineth Realmâ€‘lords Infantry unit wholly within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Ignore all modifiers to save rolls for the target (positive and negative) until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Blinding Bolts

header.text: Once Per Battle, Your Shooting Phase

abilities.effect: If all of this unitâ€™s shooting attacks this turn target the same enemy unit, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the targetâ€™s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Scryhawks
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 6" to the Range characteristic of this unitâ€™s Starshard Bolts while it is wholly within 12" of any friendly Vanari Auralan Sentinels units.

abilities.name: Equal Prodigies
abilities.declare: Pick whether Ellania will take the lead or Ellathor will take the lead.
abilities.effect: If Ellania takes the lead, until the start of your next turn, add 1 to this unitâ€™s power level and it has Ward (4+). If Ellathor takes the lead, until the start of your next turn, add the current battle round number to the Damage characteristic of Altairi.

abilities.name: Total Eclipse
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the first time an enemy unit uses a command within 18" of this unit, your opponent must spend an additional command point to use that command.

abilities.name: Sudden Translocation
abilities.effect: This unit can use this ability if any enemy models were slain by it this turn. Heal (D6) this unit. Then, remove it from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. When using the â€˜Equal Prodigiesâ€™ ability in your next turn, you must pick Ellania to take the lead.

abilities.name: Realmscribe

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a Summon Spell ability for this unit

abilities.effect: Change the casting roll for that spell to a value of 8 that cannot be modified.

abilities.name: Shrine Guardian
abilities.effect:
While this terrain feature has a Shrine Guardian:

â€¢ This terrain feature has a Move characteristic of 6" and can use Move abilities as if it were a unit.
â€¢ The Shrine Guardian cannot use Move abilities and remains on this terrain feature each time it moves.
â€¢ Instead of measuring range or visibility to the Shrine Guardian, measure to this terrain feature instead.
â€¢ All attacks that would target the Shrine Guardian target this terrain feature instead.
â€¢ If this terrain feature is destroyed, before removing it from the battlefield, inflict D3 mortal damage on the Shrine Guardian. Then, set up the Shrine Guardian on the battlefield wholly within 3" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer a Shrine Guardian. If it is not possible to set up the Shrine Guardian, it is slain.

abilities.name: Cleansing Rituals

header.text: Once Per Turn, Reaction: You declared a Spell ability for a unit wholly within 12" of this terrain feature

abilities.effect: While this terrain feature has a Shrine Guardian, you can re-roll the casting roll for that spell.

abilities.name: Exit the Shrine
abilities.effect: If this terrain feature has a Shrine Guardian, set up the Shrine Guardian on the battlefield wholly within 6" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer a Shrine Guardian.

abilities.name: Enter the Shrine
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature does not have a Shrine Guardian, pick a friendly Lumineth Realmâ€‘lords Infantry Hero within 3" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Place the target on this terrain feature. The target is now a Shrine Guardian (see â€˜Shrine Guardianâ€™).

abilities.name: Fortitude of the Earth
abilities.effect: This unit has Ward (5+) while all of its models are contesting an objective you control.

abilities.name: Wall of Blades
abilities.effect: If this unit did not charge this turn and is in combat with an enemy unit that charged this turn, roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if that enemy unit is Cavalry. On a 4+, this unit has Strike-first for the rest of the turn.

profile.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Lumineth Paragon.

abilities.name: World Banner
abilities.effect: Add 3 to the control scores of other friendly Lumineth Realmâ€‘lords units while they are wholly within 18" of this unit.

abilities.name: Lofted Shots
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 6" to the Range characteristic of this unitâ€™s Auralan Bows but subtract 1 from hit rolls for this unitâ€™s shooting attacks.

abilities.name: Spirit of the Wind
abilities.effect: While friendly Hurakan units are wholly within 12" of this unit, they can use Shoot and/or Charge abilities even if they used a Run or Retreat ability in the same turn and no mortal damage is inflicted on them by Retreat abilities.

abilities.name: Hunters of Majestic Beasts
abilities.effect: The Damage characteristic of this unitâ€™s Bow of the Windâ€™s Vengeance is 3 for attacks that target Monsters.

abilities.name: Living Cyclone

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll, then this unit can move 6", but it must end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Myari Lightcaller
abilities.effect: While this unitâ€™s Myari Lightcaller is on the battlefield, it has Wizard (1) and the Scinari keyword.

abilities.name: Dazzling Light
abilities.declare: Pick an objective that you do not control that is within 18" of and visible to this unitâ€™s Myari Lightcaller, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units that are contesting that objective.

abilities.name: Travel The Waterways
abilities.effect: Remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield wholly within 6" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Relentless as the Driving Current
abilities.effect: This unit can move 2D6". It can pass through models in enemy units but must end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Living Fissue
abilities.declare: Pick a point on the battlefield within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Draw a straight line between the target and the closest part of this unitâ€™s base. Roll a D3 for each unit (friendly and enemy) that the line passes across. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Stonemage Stance
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Alarith Aelf unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the targetâ€™s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Windcharger Arrows
abilities.effect: Ward rolls cannot be made for damage points inflicted by this unitâ€™s shooting attacks.
